Articles.Content: I am going to make a KSP movie. I want to have all the tech tree nodes unlocked, but keep the R&D facility only level two. Is there a way to do this?

Surprisingly, yes! With a mod.

sarbian's Custom Barn Kit lets you set the science unlock limits by level for the R&D building. So you can set it to -1 (unlimited) at level 2 already instead of at level 3, and unlock nodes to your heart's contend.

All worship the sarbian!

Please set the topic prefix to "[Answered]".

You can do that by editing your original post on this thread.
